website_summaries.verdict: A tall medicine cabinet with embedded and bright LED lighting.
pros: Door slides rather than hinged opening
Can be recessed or hung on a wall
cons: This unit plugs in and is not intended to be hard-wired
It may be difficult to hide the wires

customer_reviews.title: and a wonderful color. It lights the room nicely and makes ...
customer_reviews.text: While this is designed to be mounted on-wall, I was able to built a mounting board that recesses it a couple inches into the wall (enough to keep the power switch revealed, and the slide tracks free. The slide tracks dictate that your wall on either side should be clear and free from things mounted to the wall, giving the mirror the area to open and close. the led lighting is bright, vivid, and a wonderful color. It lights the room nicely and makes me feel like I'm in a hotel bathroom every morning. This is a very nice product and my wife and I have been enjoying it. Keep up the good work HomCom.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shipp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and inexpensive statement mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful LED mirror. Works perfectly although I'm afraid it will probably rust and although it's well made and sturdy I feel it might not last forever. Very easy to install but the holes are not 16", they are 16.5" which is why they provide the wall anchor.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Cano

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, but the mirror is rather deep
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but the mirror is rather deep. It won't work to inset it either because of the switches, wires, and sliding tracks. It slides only partially both ways so it would not do well to have it next to a wall. It has an exterior plug, black, that you need to run to an outlet. Not the prettiest looking set up. I'll live with it for awhile and see it I can learn to like it better.
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: Mirror mirror on the wall. Who’s the fairest mirror of them all?
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our narrow bathroom. The sliding mirror when opened exposes lots of medicine cabinet room for storage. The LED light built into the mirror is perfect light for shaving or makeup application. I surface mounted the mirror to clear two wall sconces lights. They are LED low profile so clearance isn’t an issue. The mirror slides effortlessly left or right exposing the his or hers side of the interior cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Welldon Fargo

customer_reviews.title: A great spend!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with the quality of this product. It was so reasonably priced that I wondered what I might receive. It was definitely a pleasant surprise. The packaging was amazing! Glass and electronic components shipping such a distance can be tricky. These guys nailed i! The item was a bit bigger than I expected. Let's face it, a bathroom vanity can NEVER be too big. It's a great size with tons of internal storage. The glass & sliding mechanism are very high quality and the light it puts off has a nice cool hue. I would definitely shop with these guys again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: Great mirrored medicine cabinet. The LED light is a perfect brightness. Make sure you have enough room on each side to open this cabinet. The white wire on top that is pretty obvious when the mirror gets slid back and forth is kind of annoying but necessary so I deal with it. All and all very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Beth McBrayer

customer_reviews.title: I’m renovated my bathroom and I fall in love with this sliding cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I’m renovated my bathroom and I fall in love with this sliding cabinet! It is a good size just perfect to my bathroom it’s heavy you probably need some help installed it. thanks
customer_reviews.author: RAMON CACERES

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful modern look
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s a very good looking mirror and light. My contractor was able to install it with ease. Looks great. The wire that runs along the to is the only draw back but when to hardware store and found clips to hold it in place. Love the look
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not for long term use!
customer_reviews.text: Only in use for 7 months and the light no longer functions. You can not remove the front sliding door without seriously damaging it. Waste of a hundred dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great for hidden personal storage in a teens bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's room. It looks great and gives him storage for sunglasses, his wallet, keys and grooming products. And also gives a great light for evening when he's watching videos or playing video games. It looks very cool and modern in his room.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: quick install
customer_reviews.text: hang it, connect it done . Good brightness and looks good enough space for small objects. Good price for it.
customer_reviews.author: roman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It a beautiful medicine cabinet,very easy to install,you don't need extra lights...I bought first a medicine cabinet also with mirors,but was too tall 37" ,if you add 34" base cabinet will have already 71" almost 6 feet. You leave 10" space between them and you have 7 feet to reach. You are a very tall or you need a ladder.So I returned the cabinef from Ikea and install t his one.
customer_reviews.author: Ioan Zan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is very pretty in the bathroom remodel. Nice, bright lights.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting!!!
customer_reviews.text: great product! the sliding mirror is an awesome feature! & the lighting is great for makeup application! better than i expected!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Need a receptacle nearby.
customer_reviews.text: Like the cabinet and install was easy. Not crazy about the visible wires.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ADD to my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice addition to our small bathroom. The light is very bright on the mirror. Which makes it great for shaving and applying makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Loudog

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this mirror!
customer_reviews.text: The LED Light burnt out this week. September 2020. Lasted only 2 and 1/2 years. Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Judy G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I absolutely LOVE this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I absolutely LOVE this mirror! The sliding from side to side makes it wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Feet

customer_reviews.title: great price for product
customer_reviews.text: this item is exactly what I was looking for, very modern, sturdy, great size and I love that it slides BOTH ways (especially because there is a wall to the left of where I hung it and needed to slide it to the right to use the left side of it).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer curran

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The only downfall is that the LED light is not replaceable. Beautiful, and love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTS DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I wasted my money on this fixture.... the lights are flashing on and off
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Sekhon

customer_reviews.title: The door doesn’t open more than 6 inches
customer_reviews.text: The bearings on the doors are a joke . They fall off . Made of super thin material
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Light stopped after one day.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my master bath. They are really nice but after less than one day up and the light in my vanity won’t turn on. The husbands is still working. I tried to contact the seller about a replacement and amazon said the message couldn’t be delivered. If they will replace my defected mirror then I would give it 5 stars but not when half the order doesn’t work after one day.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love it! the only thing i don't like is ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! the only thing i don't like is this white electrical wire to the sliding door, sticks straight up and is visible and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: MacDawg

customer_reviews.title: Meh... Should have spent more
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap and flimsy but it works. I recessed it into the wall, bit only 1-1/2" because it needs room to slide and any further the switch would be buried in the wall. Also, the mirror doesn't slide 100% clear of the cabniet so you really need to be able to slide it BOTH left and right if you want to get to your things easily. The light is _very_ cool... like 7000 kelvin or more blue...
customer_reviews.author: Jon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for an LED light! It’s spacious and the light works great! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Be back
customer_reviews.text: Not installed yet but it looks like a gem. I’ll be back to update this when I finish the install.
customer_reviews.author: jackyboy

product_meta.title: HOMCOM 30" LED Illuminated Wall Mirror Medicine Cabinet Bathroom Sliding Door Vertical Stainess Steel
feature_bullets: ✅UNIQUE SLIDING DOOR DESIGN: Simple style, stainless steel bathroom lockers, suitable for all types of bathrooms, and lasting new. To help save space the illuminated cabinet door opens horizontally on a slide mechanism that allows you to use the mirror while simultaneously having access to the inside of the case.
✅ILLUMINATION ADDS AMBIANCE AND STYLE: The square border strip of LED lights add soft illumination and makes your reflection and smile brighter and clearer.
✅ENERGY EFFICIENT AND EARTH FRIENDLY: The LED lights are highly energy efficient and earth friendly and can help save money on your electric bill month to month.
✅EASY ON/OFF BUTTON: A simple on/off button on the side of the wall mounted cabinet makes turning your LED lights on and off.
✅CONVENIENT STORAGE: 3-tier shelves provide ample cabinet storage within this sliding wall mirror for all of your toiletries and beauty accessories, holding up to 33 lbs of weight.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars68 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
